segments.text: Would you talk to me about taking one of Dr . Miller's classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Have you ever been in one of his classes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm thinking about taking his class next semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He was a very easy teacher . Are you thinking of taking a class with him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure because I really need to learn something , but I also worry about grades .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Grades are important , but don't you think that gaining the knowledge is important , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really need to learn this stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He made everything so interesting that the time just flew by . Do you know what I mean ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that sounds right for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you know that he came here last year after 10 years in the military ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I already knew that . That could be a good thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you know that you have to make the best decision for you . Enjoy your year !
segments.speaker: S2
